titleStmt.title: Articles for visitation concerning certain matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the Diocess of Ely. In the primory episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God Benjamin by divine permission Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Ely. Bishop (1667-1675 : Laney)
Laney, Benjamin, 1591-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, printer to the universitie.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Jesus College (University of Cambridge) Library.
